channel.title: How do i make my self a mod on my own server?
channel.description: Ive been playin about a week, and im still dumb as a rock when it comes to commands on moparscape, so As the headings say, how do i make my self a mod on my own Moparscape Server?

yes i do know how t change all the welcome stuff

item.title: How do i make my self a mod on my own server?
item.dc:creator: @pancholip pancholip
item.description:
@pancholip wrote:

the simpliest way is to open the charactes folder pull up you file, fin the line that says character rights and you can change it, 0 for regular players, 1 for mods, 2 for golden mods, 3 for admins.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make my self a mod on my own server?
item.dc:creator: @Null Null
item.description:
@Null wrote:

Ok go to client.java and search for:

 //start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin

Then just put in ur name like this:
{
playerRights = 3;
}

else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("[glow=yellow,2,300]Night[/glow]"))
{

PLayer rights:
3)= Owner Other ppl can see your crown but you dont, golden color
2)= Admin every 1 can see your crown golden
1)= Moderator Silver crown
